name: As Many Times As It Takes
name_original: As Many Times As It Takes
description:
WARNING: Contains adult language, implied sexual situations, implied infidelity

This project is both an attempt to fix and be a love letter to Voltron: Legendary Defender. Play through Keith's Post-Canon quest to unravel a series of mysterious wormholes. Strive for all four endings! 

UPDATE: Hopefully fixed some bugs and actually fixed the issue with builds! I have a web browser version ready to go, I'm waiting to hear back about expanding the limit for the page so I can upload it. Unfortunately there will be no further updates since I'm moving on from this project! Thank you for your time!
